channel.title: Changing the home location
channel.description:
Hi, I wanna change the X cords and the Y cords of the home teleport location. When I go to client.java, I just can't find it.. I looked through some tutorials and found that if "} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) {".. I went to my client.java and tried to find that there but I couldn't.. So I think I'm using a delta base source but I just can't really find it. Please help, it will be greatly appreciated.
Sorry, but I'm a beginner.. I do try to find tutorial and follow 'em but I couldn't find a tutorial about this.
Thanks once again! :) :) :)

deltascape is a bad source for begginers…use something easier

item.title: Changing the home location
item.dc:creator: @ajn ajn
item.description:
@ajn wrote:

ooh, well first what i would do is go to where the teleport takes you

write down the coords then look them up in client.java

once you find them, make sure they are the correct ones and for the teleport case, rewrite them with the coords that you want and there you go.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the home location
item.dc:creator: @dirtynife dirtynife
item.description:
@dirtynife wrote:

Well, you know when you go to the magic book there are teleports, and when you pass your mouse on them it says “home” and if you click it you will most likely to go to egde, lumby w/e… Well I wanna change the location of where it teleports you and I can’t really find it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 30, 2009, 06:22:20 am[/size][hr]Help me!

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the home location
item.dc:creator: @dirtynife dirtynife
item.description:
@dirtynife wrote:

Hi, I wanna change the X cords and the Y cords of the home teleport location. When I go to client.java, I just can’t find it… I looked through some tutorials and found that if “} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”)) {”… I went to my client.java and tried to find that there but I couldn’t… So I think I’m using a delta base source but I just can’t really find it. Please help, it will be greatly appreciated.

Sorry, but I’m a beginner… I do try to find tutorial and follow 'em but I couldn’t find a tutorial about this.

Thanks once again!
